session_summary: Batch 4 onboarding refactor support + onboarding infra/test hardening. Extended soft onboarding lock semantics tests, added headless/CI-safe fallbacks for messaging vs GUI, wired onboarding tests into existing CI, and cleaned Agent-3 inbox with captain + A2A acknowledgments.

completed_tasks.task: Batch 4 Onboarding Refactor - Infra & Test Support
deliverables: Extended unit tests for soft_onboard_agent and soft_onboard_multiple_agents lock behaviour
Characterized PyAutoGUI-unavailable fallbacks to messaging-based cleanup and onboarding paths
Verified tests pass locally and are covered by existing CI matrix
completed_tasks.description: Acted as infra/test force multiplier for Batch 4 by strengthening characterization tests around keyboard_control_lock and multi-agent onboarding flows, ensuring refactors remain backwards compatible.

deliverables: Responded to Captain JET FUEL activation message with status update
Acknowledged Batch 4 onboarding support plan via A2A to Agent-1
Archived existing Agent-3 inbox messages into date-stamped folder
completed_tasks.description: Closed the loop with Captain (Agent-4) and Agent-1 on Batch 4 + infra work, then archived all processed inbox messages to keep Agent-3 workspace clean for next session.

deliverables: Identified need for dedicated onboarding test runner tool under tools/
Confirmed existing CI already runs onboarding unit tests
completed_tasks.description: Documented the need for a small helper script to run/report onboarding tests quickly during future refactors; implementation can be added in a follow-up infra-focused cycle.

cases_added: soft_onboard_multiple_agents wraps entire operation in single keyboard_control lock
soft onboarding uses messaging cleanup when PyAutoGUI is unavailable
soft onboarding uses messaging-based onboarding when PyAutoGUI is unavailable
onboarding_services.notes: 7 tests total passing; tests treat onboarding public APIs as behavioural contract for future refactors.

agent_1.task: Batch 4 onboarding refactor support - infra/test coverage status update

agent_4.task: JET FUEL package + Batch 4 onboarding support status update

next_session_priorities: Continue Batch 2: hardened_activity_detector.py Module 3 & 4 (Tier 2 checkers + orchestrator)
Support Batch 4 onboarding services refactor as needed (infra review + additional tests)
Add dedicated onboarding test runner tool under tools/ for quick local verification
Monitor CI for onboarding-related regressions and extend coverage if gaps appear
notes: Batch 4 onboarding refactor now guarded by infra-grade onboarding tests (lock semantics and GUI-vs-messaging fallbacks).
Agent-3 inbox cleaned and archived; Captain and Agent-1 have up-to-date status messages in their inboxes.
Onboarding tests are executed by existing CI workflows (ci-cd.yml testing job, unit category).
Future improvement: small onboarding test runner tool for rapid local validation during refactors.

knowledge_transfers.onboarding_lock_semantics: soft_onboard_agent acquires keyboard_control lock when not already held, skips reacquiring when already locked, and soft_onboard_multiple_agents wraps the entire multi-agent flow in a single lock context.
knowledge_transfers.headless_onboarding_fallbacks: When PyAutoGUI is unavailable, soft onboarding steps 3 and 6 route through messaging-based cleanup and onboarding helpers, keeping Discord/self-healing flows operational in CI/headless environments.
